short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set custom background color of GitHub by selecting a color from the popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want GitHub background of your own choice and you get only one dark theme or light theme? This extension is here to fulfil your desire. Visit GitHub and click on the extension button to choose a color from the popup. Selected color will be set as the background color of the GitHub pages. Change any time you get bored and set another background. [Open Source]
